titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OXFORD SHOULDER SCORE (QUESTION 3) - Description

body.p: OXFORD SHOULDER SCORE (QUESTION 3) is the PERSON SCORE for question 3 of the Oxford Orthopaedic Questionnaire (Shoulder) .
The question asks the PATIENT "Have you had any trouble getting in and out of a car or using public transport because of your shoulder?"
